short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps you break out of your echo chamber.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension adds a button to your browser toolbar. Click the doppl icon whenever you want to get a different angle from the news article you're currently reading.

The extension automatically suggests between one and three different takes on the topic you're reading about.

Learn more about doppl at https://doppl.info
